name: Woocommerce-minimum-order-amount
author: getJuicy

sections.description:
Woocommerce Minimum order amount allows you to set a minimum order amount on your store.

You can toggle minimum amount on/off from the admin menu

You can access the plugin options from the admin menu
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the “Min Order Admin“ tab added to the admin menu to your minimum order amount
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the “Min Order Admin“ tab added to the admin menu to your minimum order amount

Can I turn the minimum amount on and off

Yes you can toggle it on and off

Is there a limit

No limit, just ensure the number use two decimal places
